scripts.build: astro build && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const p='dist/kelime-fethi/sw.js';if(fs.existsSync(p)){const ts=new Date().toISOString().replace(/[-:T]/g,'').slice(0,12);fs.writeFileSync(p,fs.readFileSync(p,'utf8').replace(/BUILD_TS = '[^']*'/,'BUILD_TS = \''+ts+'\''));console.log('[SW] BUILD_TS updated to '+ts)}"
